sentences.sContent: The exoskeleton of insects is largely made of protein and chitin.
sentences.sContent_eng: The exoskeleton of insects is largely made of protein and chitin.
sentences.sCn: 昆虫的外骨骼大部分是由蛋白质和几丁质组成的。

sentences.sContent: The exoskeleton structure of female pleopod in Macrobrachium rosenbergii was primarily investigated by histological method.
sentences.sContent_eng: The exoskeleton structure of female pleopod in Macrobrachium rosenbergii was primarily investigated by histological method.
sentences.sCn: 用组织学方法初步研究了罗氏沼虾雌体腹肢外骨骼的结构。

sentences.sContent: He was wearing an elaborate exoskeleton suit that enabled him to, remarkably, tap a soccer ball with his foot using only his mind—no buttons, no muscles, just brainwaves.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was wearing an elaborate exoskeleton suit that enabled him to, remarkably, tap a soccer ball with his foot using only his mind—no buttons, no muscles, just brainwaves.
sentences.sCn: 凭借身上穿戴的一套“外骨骼装置”，他仅靠自己的意念就完成了开球动作——没错，既不靠按钮，也不靠肌肉，而是靠脑电波。

trans.tranOther: the hard parts on the outside of the body of creatures such as insects and crabs
